channel.title: Need A Little Help With Combat
channel.description: Ok This is my first time coding full combat and I need a little help getting started first off... where do I start and can anyone get me through the basics in combat.

item.description:

Ok i have never had the chance to code full combat from a source with no combat… like winterlove so can anyone help me from the basics … thats what i mean
